answerText: Kenzaburo Oe[10] The bombing of Hiroshima is also the subject of a novel by this author in which Shizuma Shigumatsu tries to find a spouse for his niece Yasuko, which is problematic due to her exposure to the title Black Rain.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 1 | 10 | Literature | Other | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Answer these questions about the bombing of Hiroshima in literature, for 10 points each. [10] This author wrote a series of essays about the bombing called Hiroshima Notes. He is better known for novels like The Silent Cry and A Personal Matter.
